statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_reports;
SELECT report_id, month_year, revenue FROM hotel_reports WHERE expenses > 5000;
SELECT report_id, month_year, occupancy_rate FROM hotel_reports WHERE revenue < 10000 ORDER BY occupancy_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_reports WHERE month_year LIKE '2022%';
SELECT month_year, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM hotel_reports GROUP BY month_year ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_reports WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY month_year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, revenue, expenses FROM hotel_reports WHERE expenses < 2000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT month_year FROM hotel_reports WHERE occupancy_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM hotel_reports WHERE month_year = 'June 2021';
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(occupancy_rate) AS max_occupancy_rate FROM hotel_reports WHERE revenue < 10000;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports
SELECT report_id, total_revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE month_date = '2022-01-31'
SELECT room_revenue, restaurant_revenue FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY room_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM expense_reports WHERE total_expenses > 5000
SELECT report_id, labor_expenses FROM expense_reports
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT total_revenue, room_revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE month_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT report_id, total_expenses FROM expense_reports ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT AVG(room_revenue) AS avg_room_revenue FROM revenue_reports GROUP BY month_date;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports JOIN expense_reports ON revenue_reports.report_id = expense_reports.report_id;
SELECT * FROM revenue ORDER BY month_id DESC;
SELECT month_id, revenue_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM occupancy_rates WHERE occupancy_rate < 0.8 ORDER BY month_id ASC;
SELECT month_id, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY month_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY month_id;
SELECT month_id, revenue_amount, expense_amount, revenue_amount - expense_amount AS net_profit FROM revenue INNER JOIN expenses ON revenue.month_id = expenses.month_id;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE month_id = 3 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC
SELECT month_id, sum(revenue_amount) as total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY month_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT r.month_id, r.revenue_amount, e.expense_amount FROM revenue r JOIN expenses e ON r.month_id = e.month_id WHERE r.revenue_amount > e.expense_amount
SELECT * FROM occupancy_rates WHERE occupancy_rate >= 0.8 ORDER BY month_id
SELECT month_id, AVG(revenue_amount) as average_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY month_id HAVING average_revenue > 5000
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT month, revenue_amount FROM revenue ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT year, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY year;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE month IN ('January', 'February', 'March');
SELECT * FROM occupancy_rate WHERE occupancy_percentage > 80;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT month, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY month ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM hotel JOIN revenue ON hotel.hotel_id = revenue.report_id GROUP BY hotel_name, location;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE year = 2022 AND expense_amount > 5000;

SELECT hotel_name, location, AVG(occupancy_percentage) AS avg_occupancy FROM hotel JOIN occupancy_rate ON hotel.hotel_id = occupancy_rate.occupancy_id GROUP BY hotel_name, location ORDER BY avg_occupancy DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports WHERE year = 2022
SELECT room_number, room_type FROM hotel_rooms WHERE max_occupancy > 2
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservations ORDER BY check_in_date DESC
SELECT report_id, month, total_expense FROM expense_reports WHERE year = 2021
SELECT report_id, year, occupancy_rate FROM occupancy_reports
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, total_revenue FROM revenue_reports WHERE total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT rr.report_id, rr.month, rr.year, er.total_expense FROM revenue_reports rr JOIN expense_reports er ON rr.report_id = er.report_id WHERE rr.total_revenue > er.total_expense ORDER BY rr.report_id ASC;

SELECT r.guest_name, rr.month, rr.year, er.total_expense FROM reservations r JOIN revenue_reports rr ON r.room_id = rr.report_id JOIN expense_reports er ON rr.report_id = er.report_id WHERE rr.total_revenue - er.total_expense > 5000 ORDER BY rr.year DESC, rr.month DESC;
SELECT rr.year, COUNT(*) as num_reports, SUM(rr.total_revenue) as total_revenue FROM revenue_reports rr GROUP BY rr.year HAVING total_revenue > 50000 ORDER BY rr.year ASC;
